name: @media-network/media-sn
description: For rapid prototyping Media CMS with prev/next/random navigator, FB integration and multiple themes
author: LongLH <i.me.mine@luchoanglong.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "np run start:worker-media" "npm run start:worker-indexing"
scripts.start:server: nodemon core --exec babel-node --watch core --watch config.dev.js --ignore node_modules --ext js --CONFIG=config.dev.js
scripts.start:worker-media: nodemon core/workers/media --exec babel-node --watch core --watch config.dev.js --ignore node_modules --ext js --CONFIG=config.dev.js
scripts.start:worker-indexing: nodemon core/workers/indexing --exec babel-node --watch core --watch config.dev.js --ignore node_modules --ext js --CONFIG=config.dev.js
scripts.build: babel core -d core.legacy && cp -a core/admin/views/. core.legacy/admin/views && cp -a core/admin/public/. core.legacy/admin/public
